1491458216303423488.text: Let’s take a walk and talk about what happened this week in Washington. https://t.co/35mjmwo2e0

1491147151162081280.text: One of my favorite duties as a Member of Congress is nominating outstanding young men and women to our nation's service academies from the 6th Congressional District. This was a highly competitive process, and I could not be prouder of what they have already accomplished. https://t.co/rA7iD4hGgY

1490028861026930690.text: Over the last couple of weeks, I have had the opportunity to tour and visit with many of our local law enforcement personnel. I can say, without a doubt, our district has the best law enforcement in the State of Texas. And they are all better shots than your Congressman! https://t.co/iH02ByoyWD

1481749570296160256.text: Battalion Chief David Maeker thank you for your incredible service and leadership in our community and to those that need it most. https://t.co/36S8OqIkmk

1481387047449509888.text: I had a great time touring @Airbus  in Fort Worth last week. I got to spend some time in their helicopter simulator. It turns out I can still fly! We're doing amazing things here in House District 6th. Thanks for having me! https://t.co/VN9VX1ZGII

1480731260783894531.text: I will never give in when it comes to opposing private interests using eminent domain to take someone’s property. Land cannot be taken, homes destroyed, and lives disrupted for a private company’s boondoggle. https://t.co/reXP8bLHil

1478865003545509894.text: Today was a very special day. I met 22 outstanding young men and women who want to dedicate their lives to defending our nation. In so doing, they took the last step to gain entrance to our nation's military academies. https://t.co/v1bEOg9D2D

1473378697772253193.text: The level of innovation I saw from the applicants from House District six was nothing short of remarkable. Congratulations to Eshan on all of his hard work and this tremendous accomplishment. https://t.co/hiikbao5aT

1472026182329802752.text: Let’s talk a walk and talk about what happened this week in Washington. https://t.co/NDO3Ya13Ad

1471145379496398853.text: Today, I had the honor to be an original co-sponsor of the Microelectronics Research for Energy Innovation Act. 1469441645443694597.text: This week, I had the honor of meeting with State Representative Jacey Jetton, Dr. Xiqiu “Bob” Fu, Mrs. Deborah Fikes, Ran Peng, and Ruiting Renon about how to preserve and advance human rights and discussed the deadly actions of some countries destroying human rights. https://t.co/LvhwP0HjQ3

1468433823817998336.text: It is appropriate that on the 80th anniversary of Pearl Harbor that Congress unite and pass the NDAA. As members elected to this body, it is our duty to protect our country. With the passing of the NDAA, today we did that. https://t.co/BEhWstc1zK

1468325822322855941.text: Today, on the 80th anniversary of the devastating attack on Pearl Harbor, we remember the 2,403 Americans who were taken from their friends and families too soon. Today, we put aside our differences and unite to remember what makes us all Americans.

1466940037971562497.text: Would you take a walk with me? Let’s talk about what happened this week in Washington. https://t.co/3r5Vdw71nH

1458931298815385606.text:
Veteran's day is a day of celebration and remembrance of all of the things this nation stands for. 

Our veterans have sacrificed so much for our country, and I know they would do it again in a heartbeat. 

Thank you to my brothers and sisters in arms, and Happy Veteran's Day.

1458480889063686150.text:
246 years of defending our country. 246 years of sacrificing. 246 years of holding the line. Happy Birthday, Marines. We would not be here without you. Semper Fi. I salute you. 

Here is to 246 more! https://t.co/DszqwuWcnI

1457761151220133891.text: Last Friday, after the longest vote in our history, Nancy Pelosi rammed through the Democrat's disastrous socialist tax and spending spree through the House. I voted NO.

1456646199533056001.text:
Small businesses are the backbone of our country. They are the key to the American Dream. Many veterans, after their time in the service, choose to open their own business. And this week we celebrate them.
 
Let's support our veterans. Happy Veterans Small Business week!

1456428799135035400.text: If there is one thing Congress can agree on, it is that we need to help our veterans. I'm grateful to Chairman Takano, Ranking Member @RepBost, and my fellow committee members for unanimously voting the VITAL Assessment act for further consideration on the House Floor. https://t.co/qHrjpG2XEg

1454148468948275204.text: We must protect our individual freedoms. Today, I am signing on to H.R. 5360 to nullify President Biden's executive orders regarding COVID-19 mandates and to prohibit the Secretary of Labor from issuing a rule mandating vaccination against COVID-19.

1443349253942874119.text: Wearing two hats tonight. One for my Papa who passed away a year ago. One for Mark Sanders, my EOD, and USNA brother. https://t.co/fw4cnPgPzH

1436790694249746438.text: This year marks the 20th anniversary of the September 11th attacks on our nation. Let today be a day for those who would protest what this country is, what they think it is, be a day of remembrance and understanding of who we are. Not what they have been told we are.

1431780999914983429.text: Today, the Department of Defense announced that Marine Corps Lance Cpl. David L. Espinoza, 20, of Rio Bravo, Texas, was among the 13 brave men and women who gave their lives in defense of the Kabul Airport. My heart goes out to the families of these American Heroes.

1431039529889243138.text: Today 12 American heroes died in a suicide bombing at Kabul Airport. Biden recently said that we could trust the Taliban; the events of this morning reaffirm why we cannot. Please join me in sending prayers to the families of these warriors who made the ultimate sacrifice.

1417217357903241220.text: Governor Abbott just signed HB 885 which I am proud to have co-authored. Navarro College is allowed to add a baccalaureate degree in nursing to their degree offerings. This will have an incredible positive impact on Ellis County, Navarro County, DFW and surrounding areas. https://t.co/Hz9croOQnv

1400135843118030851.text: While we passed positive law enforcement reforms, I support and will continue to support enforcement. In regard to HB 2366, it hits close to home. I have mentioned before that as a pilot I have been lased and it damages eye sight and obstructs vision. #txlege

1400135842044203008.text: https://t.co/mlKNu4RZIs "In Texas, we don't defund law enforcement, we back law enforcement. 1397671710468489218.text: I am proud to have co-authored and passed HB 2622 to make Texas a 2nd Amendment Sanctuary State. Texas will NOT enforce any federal order or law that infringes on the right to keep and bear arms. #txlege https://t.co/QbrklhW4G8

1392891872759197709.text: Faith is essential in many Texans lives. That's why I Co-Authored for #HB525 to designate houses of worship as "essential" in state law. No government official can ever use the law to close the doors to people of faith. #txlege

1392569785096019972.text: HB 3, the Texas Pandemic Disaster Act, passed out of the Texas House. The bill clarifies government emergency powers and limitations during a pandemic disaster. HB 3 protects Texans' constitutional rights & ensures a streamlined & effective response to a future pandemic. #txlege https://t.co/HRABBVQzYr

1392552295376773122.text: Proud Co-Author of HB 1195. Protecting Texas small businesses and other businesses for unnecessary taxes #txlege https://t.co/ajcGOBRaaF

1387813206740160521.text:
I am proud to have Co-Authored HB 1900 creating financial consequences for cities defunding the police. Defunding the police will put citizens and other officers in danger. I believe in working together for positive reform but defunding is not the correct approach. 

#txlege

1387805965693726725.text:
I am continuing to fight for TEXAN'S 2nd Amendment rights by co-authoring HB 2622. This helps make Texas a 2nd-Amendment Sanctuary State. No state resources can be used to enforce federal firearms laws that are not also state laws. 

#txlege

1386045036047921153.text: I’m committed to helping secure the border. Biden-Harris failing. Texas stepping up. I voted to fund $797 million for border security purposes at DPS & 8 other state agencies. Border security funding supports DPS personnel at full deployment levels. #txlege #securetheborder

1385679612819107840.text: Pleased to support #TexasHouse budget. Passed unanimously. It is a  conservative budget. There is no Medicaid expansion. Supports school choice, charter schools. Keeps promises to students and teachers. Continues property tax relief #txlege
